biotools.summary: Regulatory RNA (RegRNA) is a server for identifying regulatory RNA motifs and elements in mRNA sequences including: motifs located in the 5'-UTR and 3'-UTR, motifs involved in mRNA splicing and transcriptional regulation, other motifs in mRNA such as riboswitches and splice donor/acceptor sites, RNA structural features, and miRNA target sites.
